name: 2 player platformer
description:
Music by me but there is a better remix here https://musiclab.chromeexperiments.com/Song-Maker/song/4855788208652288

Red controls; W to jump, A and D to move

Blu controls; same, but with arrow keys

Submission to Nibble10 Game jam

Description: Red is fast, but Blu can see further. Help them escape the lava, and don't try to hard to win.
